OpenJIT

Distribution

OpenJIT is distributed under the terms of a BSD-like license. This version of OpenJIT runs on environments below, and Compiling it requires the GNU C Compiler (version 2.8.1 or egcs-1.1.2 or later) and GNU make.

Supported environments

SPARC processor running Solaris 2.6
with JDK1.1.8 and JDK1.2.2
X86 processor running Linux 2.2
with Blackdown's JDK117v3 and JDK1.2pre2
X86 processor running FreeBSD (3.3-RELEASE or 2.2.8-RELEASE)
with FreeBSD.ORG's jdk1.1.8_{ELF,AOUT}.V99-9-22
openjit@is.titech.ac.jp
